name: Jalapeno Poppers
recipeIngredient: 12 jalapeno peppers, cut in half and seeded

recipeInstructions.text: Heat cream cheese in microwave until soft (30 seconds). Add cheddar cheese and garlic powder. Combine, and add the mixture into the peppers, filling them to the top.
Cut the bacon strips in half and wrap around the pepper, securing with a toothpick. Cook for about 30 minutes or until done.
